about_the_game:
Just like the story depicted by the icons of the RPG GAME MAKER series,
this music pack wants to provide game developers who create JRPGs with various background music and sound effects needed from the beginner's village to the final boss battle.



Includes 20 background music tracks and 10 music sound effects.
